get.description: Retrieves a list of all appointments. Optionally filter by status or date via query params.

post.description: Schedules a new appointment for a student.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific appointment by its ID.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns JWT tokens.
Refreshes the JWT token using a valid refresh token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all submitted excuse slips.

post.description: Allows a student to submit an excuse slip with a supporting document (file upload).

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific excuse slip.
get.summary: Get an excuse slip by ID

delete.description: Removes the excuse slip record and the uploaded file.

patch.description: Approve or Reject an excuse slip.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of students with optional filters.

put.description: Updates the address details (region, province, city, barangay) for a student.

post.description: Creates a new student record or updates the basic profile information.

put.description: Updates the educational background information for a student.
Saves or updates the enrollment reasons for a student.
Updates the family information (including parents and parents) for a student.
Updates the financial information for a student.
Updates the health records (vision, hearing, remarks) for a student.

post.description: Creates a student record for a user (first step in onboarding)

get.description: Retrieves the residential address details for the student.
Retrieves the basic profile information for a student using their User ID.
Retrieves the student's educational background and history.
Retrieves the emergency contact details for a student.

500.description: Failed to get emergency contact info

get.description: Retrieves the enrollment reasons selected by a specific student.
Retrieves family details associated with a specific student record.
Retrieves the financial details for a student.
Retrieves the health and medical records for the student.
Retrieves a list of parents linked to the student record.
Retrieves the completion progress of various sections in a student's record.

500.description: Failed to get student record progress

get.description: Retrieves the complete profile information for a student using their User ID.
Retrieves information about the currently authenticated user.
Retrieves user information based on the provided user ID.

500.description: Failed to get user by ID
